Text.Page:
We can't let the {@LinkCreature:39#280#arachnen devastators} have the run of this place. It puts our forces at too great a disadvantage.

Cull their numbers lest they mass for an attack on our position.
Good. That's one less thing to worry about. Thank you.
We don't have the luxury of time here. I want the {@LinkCreature:39#280#arachnen devastators} dead!
